project_descr: Support the Department of Health in Limpopo to improve access to quality of health care and service delivery through the recruitment of volunteer health professionals from abroad to address the delivery level problems in hospitals around the province.

outputs.output_descr: This programme is the third phase of the UNV Support to the Health Sector in Limpopo (00039493). It is an extension of Phase 1 and Phase 2, the objective of which is the UNV/UNDP assistance to the Government of South Africa to improve health care service
Support to Health Sector in Limpopo Province for the implementation of Phase IV programme for the recruitment and placement of foreign medical doctors across the health facilities in the province.
